original_text: Then Elijah said to the people, “I, even I only, am left a prophet of the Lord, but Baal's prophets are 450 men.
korean_text: 엘리야가 백성에게 이르되 여호와의 선지자는 나만 홀로 남았으나 바알의 선지자는 사백오십 명이로다

sentences.original_text: Then Elijah said to the people,
I, even I only, am left a prophet of the Lord,
